columns.name: Development Name
columns.description: The name of the housing development as listed in the Development Data Book.

top.item: WEST SIDE URBAN RENEWAL (SITE B) 74 WEST 92ND STREET
WEST SIDE URBAN RENEWAL (SITE A) 120 WEST 94TH STREET

columns.name: Borough
columns.description: Bronx, Brooklyn, Manhattan, Queens, or Staten Island.

columns.name: Account Name
columns.description: The name of the housing development as listed in the Development Data Book.

columns.name: Location
columns.description:
"Building number. 
In order to run an analysis by building, you can use a combination of TDS and building number which gives a unique identifier for each building"

columns.name: Meter AMR
columns.description: Is the meter Automatic Meter Reading (AMR), Interval or none

columns.name: Meter Scope
columns.description: The buildings or areas the account and meter supply

columns.name: TDS #
columns.description: TDS (Tenant Data System) number is the unique identifier for all NCYHA developments. It is recommended to use it in order to run analysis by development. The TDS is also the unique link between NYCHA data sets.

columns.name: EDP
columns.description: NYCHA Electronic Data Processing. Number used to identify individual NYCHA developments. EDP is used by NYCHA only to link data issued from a different system (the energy management system that was used by NYCHA before 2010). It is recommended to use the TDS # as a unique identifier of each development.

columns.name: RC Code
columns.description:
"NYCHA budget responsibility code.  Code representing a specific development.
"

columns.name: Funding Source
columns.description:
"The development’s funding source including Federal,
Mixed Finance, or an indication that the facility is a non development facility which means a non residential facility."

columns.name: AMP #
columns.description: Abbreviation for Asset Management Project (AMP) numbers.  HUD Development asset tracking number.  An AMP number can consist of more than one development.

columns.name: Vendor Name
columns.description: Utility vendor name

columns.name: Revenue Month
columns.description: Year and month of bill: 2016-01

columns.name: Service Start Date
columns.description: Bill start date

columns.name: Service End Date
columns.description: Bill end date

columns.name: # days
columns.description: Number of days on bill

columns.name: Meter Number
columns.description: Meter number

columns.name: Estimated
columns.description: Meter was not read for the time period. The consumption and cost are estimated. (Data is updated with actual reads once the meter is read)

columns.name: Current Charges
columns.description: Total costs

columns.name: Rate Class
columns.description: The rate applied to the account.  Details about each rate (dollar value) are available on the vendor web site.

columns.name: Bill Analyzed
columns.description: The bill was analyzed for billing errors by NYCHA's Utility Management system during the billing period

columns.name: Consumption (Mlbs)
columns.description: Total Mlbs consumption
